config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is used to set the number of photons in the InstantGI constructor. It retrieves the value from the Options object passed to the constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration depends on how often the InstantGI constructor is called in the system. If the constructor is called multiple times with different values for 'gi.igi.samples', then the configuration will be triggered multiple times.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration option is on the quality of global illumination in the system. Setting a higher value for 'gi.igi.samples' will result in more accurate and smoother global illumination, but it may also increase the computational cost and rendering time.
